data.name: Gummy Jump
data.detailed_description:
In this 2D platformer, you are a gummy, you are faced with many challenges you have to overcome, you have to get to the top of the hill, even one small misstep you will fall quite far back down.), do you have what it takes?

You can either used keyboard or controller (xbox (Y is to jump) or playstation (jump is triangle)

If you go back to the menu it will reset the game to where you started, great for speed runners, not so great for casual play.

the music i have used is NCS so you can easily make video's about the game and stream it.

test your friends, if you can't beat it maybe they can, or they can just be entertaining by falling constantly.

rage is inevitable, you will 99% rage at least once when playing this, all my 112 beta testers raged.

data.short_description: you are a gummy where you have to get to the top of the hill, even one small misstep you will fall quite far back down.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Kepler
  • Storage: 64 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Asus Xonar SE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 7
  • Processor: Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Kepler
  • Storage: 64 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Asus Xonar SE
